description: Replication of the Bottenhorn et al. (2018) meta-analysis of naturalistic fMRI paradigms
exclusion_criteria: static, timed blocks of stimuli were presented with a well-defined window for participant response
assessed training or learning across multiple trials or across some period of practice (e.g., pre vs. post contrasts)
participants with any history of neurological or psychiatric diagnosis
analyses that used an a priori region(s) of interest to investigate activation or functional connectivity
does not report brain activation locations in a three-dimensional, standardized coordinate space
inclusion_criteria: tasks employing any stimulus which demanded continuous, real-time integration of dynamic streams of information
